nodes.text: Koda Station was a location in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Koda Station was pictured on a map included in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, which was written by the historian Eloc Throno.

Koda Station was first mentioned in the Fantasy Flight Games 2016 roleplaying game Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game. Koda Station was originally introduced as Koda Space Station in the Star Wars Legends 1997 novel Galaxy of Fear: The Brain Spiders, written by John Whitman.
